text: Every year I go to my mum's and we watch Comic Relief together. I always donate what I can, usually around £20. This year I've decided not to watch or donate as I don't want to perpetuate the "white saviour" image. Best of luck to everyone involved this year ❤️

I don’t think the NZ PM is right to call for an end to right wing extremism. She should call for an end to ALL extremism. Remember ALL lives matter and David Lammy criticising white saviours? We don’t need more division we need balance in approach.

So this year instead of donating to @comicrelief as our money is obviously not wanted according to @DavidLammy why don’t you donate instead to this amazing cause. Minds at War run by @mcguigan_norman helping our veterans suffering with PTSD
